website_summaries.verdict: Rock climbers looking for an inexpensive, popular gym chalk will find their match in this uncut option.
pros: Option to purchase in a variety of different sizes, from 50 grams to 300 grams
cons: Chalk is a bit chinky, but can be ground down to a finer texture

customer_reviews.title: Good chalk
customer_reviews.text: This chalk is good chalk. Get it if you need chalk. Not recommended for drawing on sidewalks. That is a different type of chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Pino

customer_reviews.title: Grip is not the best
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in chunks and I had to break it up, but it eventually becomes a fine powder that can be used directly or as a refill for a chalk sock. I did not feel the grip was sufficient as would be expected with other chalk powders that I've used. It arrived intact and looks like the pictures in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Ayed

customer_reviews.title: Super Chalky
customer_reviews.text: While other chalks may promise chalkiness this chalk is, well, chalk! Compared to no chalk, this chalk is a great improvement for bouldering or lead climbing adventures (it also works well for top rope). Pairs great with your favorite chalk bag; I recommend a large mouth chalk bag for easy access to a maximum amount chalkiness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not feel like BD White Gold
customer_reviews.text: Despite the legitimate looking packaging, this does not feel like legitimate Black Diamond White Gold chalk. My climbing partner uses White Gold and I've borrowed it on occasion and decided to purchase some, but this chalk does not feel even remotely close. It's worse than the previous cheap chalk I bought from my gym. Compared to the White Gold chalk I borrowed from my cousin, this chalk does not last as long on my hands, is not as soft, and does not help with gripping holds as well. I will not be purchasing this again from this page.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Came as a block
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a bag of chalk, nope came as a block. Not a big deal, just crushed it up. Was easy, because it was pretty much broke in piece when I received in it the mail. Other than getting the wrong product and it being smashed in the packaging. It doesn't provide the comfort on my hands I'd like when lifting. I have to re apply a lot. Sometimes it feels like my are more smooth and slippery after using it. But it was cheap, get what ya pay for ... Right?
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good chalk for climbing. Excellent price for how much you get. I would purchase this again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been using black diamond chuck for years and I am quit satisfied with them but this time it was awful, chuck is like dust (I dont mean the grain size) it even reduces the friction. it is like a powder lubricant. I dont know what is wrong with it, it has the right package and even has a product tag number. I had to buy another bag from anther website which is specifically rock climbing oriented and the product was great as usual. I recommend you to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: mehdi

customer_reviews.title: Grade A chalk
customer_reviews.text: Is there good chalk and cheap chalk? Actually yes there is. The good chalk, like this kind, stick to your hands and hold there, providing grip and protection from the start of your climb until the end of your climb. Great stuff! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: D. Purvee

customer_reviews.title: Very Grippy Chalk — love!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine said to go with a metolius block after I already purchased this. Then he tried it in my chalk bag and was shocked at the grip he was able to get with it. Great product. Easy to use with your chalk bag, and no sock required.
customer_reviews.author: Braxar

customer_reviews.title: It's chalk. It works.
customer_reviews.text: Reliable brand that delivered reliable chalk. What more can I say. Way cheaper than buying it at the gym and I was happily surprised that the bag was about twice the size I thought I was getting. Not too fine, not too chunky.
customer_reviews.author: NurseTyler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Came as a block when it stated it’s “loose” in a bag. Doesn’t wear well or stay on your hands for more than 2-3 holds before you need to rechalk
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Eh it's alright. I paid very little for what I got.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I should even be giving this four stars. It's not bad and better than gym climbing chalk but wasn't nearly as soft and smooth as some of the nicer chak I've purchased. also definitely there is moisture that has entered the bag before I purchased it which means there's a bunch of lumps. I won't be ordering it again but it's not a terrible product I also might have had a bad batch. The one I ordered was very inexpensive so I cannot complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is made to do
customer_reviews.text: The product is genuine chalk for added grip lifting weights, priced inexpensively as it should be for a cheap to produce product. You can spend 3X more on other products that do not perform the least bit better. I have been using this product for many years and the great quality has remained the same.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Gritty, but good!
customer_reviews.text: I use this chalk to climb in a gym multiple times a week and it works well and lasts a long time. It's a little grittier than I like, so if you like finer chalk this might not be for you! But if you like it a lil chunky this is perf. I got the biggest bag and it is taking forever to go through!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to chalk for nearly a year - I think the large chunks help cut down on spills, and let me crush (by hand) my choice amount of chalk. It still does come with a decent amount crushed down to fine dust.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Silva

customer_reviews.title: good chalk
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the chalk feels good. But the design of the package does not make it easy to refill the chalk.
customer_reviews.author: lalala

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay chalk. It feels pretty coarse. Definitely not as good as the Friction labs, but the white gold is WAY cheaper so that’s to be expected I guess.
customer_reviews.author: DerkDerk

customer_reviews.title: Good chalk!
customer_reviews.text: Great chalk. I got it for a great price. Stick it in a thin dress sock to make your own chalk ball for your chalk bag.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Blue

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Chalk
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the amount you get for your money. Should last me over a year with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dickman

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk for weightlifting!
customer_reviews.text: Use the chalk when I do pull ups and use my kettlebells. I like really fine, almost dust like chalk and this stuff is awesome. The big pieces break down easily and keep my hands dry. I will definitely be buying again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: master katsu

customer_reviews.title: Chalk Power!
customer_reviews.text: I love chalk! It's so versatile for the different activities I like to do. If I'm weight-lifting I rub some chalk onto my hands it helps me not lose all the skin off my hands. If I'm bouldering or rock climbing, it's the same thing. The bag has lasted me for a few months now and I do share it with my partner. I say it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: villanmichi

customer_reviews.title: not so loose
customer_reviews.text: there were a lot of chunks in the bag. You can break them, but takes a bit of effort
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: good chalk
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this chalk, I went to the gym and flashed all V10s and my boss gave me a promotion and I won the lottery. No seriously though, it's good chalk, at a good price. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great for climbing
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to break up the chunks. Works well for climbing chalk
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality good cost
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic chalk for this intermediate boulder/ rock climber. Great quality for good cost
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kainz

customer_reviews.title: Chalk
customer_reviews.text: I use this chalk for rock climbing. I put it in my chalk pouch inside my chalk bag. The chalk comes both in large solid chucks and as powder (exactly what you would expect). But is also not very tough to break apart into powder. I don't have much else to say....its chalk. I enjoy using it. I dont know any differences between chalk brands any types but I know this chalk does what I need it to do. I will buy again when I run out
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: CHUNK of Chalk
customer_reviews.text: The one I got, out of all the options presented, was the solid block of chalk, which I didn't actually expect because the product description is a bitch sketchy. When it arrived, I was sort of frustrated because taking it out of the paper got chalk everywhere, it didn't really fit in my chalk bag, and breaking it apart made an absolute mess of everything. The more I use it, though, the more I realize it's actually weirdly helpful to have chunks of chalk to break apart when I stick my hand in the bag. It ensures all the bits of my fingers get totally coated as I use them to break the pieces. Overall, I might buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good chalk for a few bucks
customer_reviews.text: Good chalk for the price for sure but worth spending more $$$. I have to chalk up almost every time I climb a boulder, it always over applied and would come off immediately during climbing. If you don’t mind chalking up every attempt it’s good chalk for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Good chalk
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality of it is really good and good for the price you pay!
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Sergio Pérez Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Black Diamond products have saved my life in many a ...
customer_reviews.text: Black Diamond products have saved my life in many a fall. I even drove out to the manufacturing plant in Salt Lake City. I feel safe with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Louis the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Decent, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Decent and low price chalk for indoor climbing. Speaking from a novice's perspective, it's a good-enough low priced option.
customer_reviews.author: Benson

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Does the job (I use it for rock climbing), but is quite chunky and not very easy to break. I definitely prefer Friction Lab
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty good so far
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything to compare this too or the price thereof ... but it seems to work pretty well. I use it for metal hand grippers/exercisers to give me better grip
customer_reviews.author: RFW III

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch maybe?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if i got a bad batch or what, but my chalk is, for lack of a better word.. stale. It feels like its old it doesn't stick to my hands and is super hard to break up. After I'm able to break it up it feels like sand when i try to rub in onto my hands, its hard, sharp and doesn't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: Excited to start using this product. Right now doing alot of running and excited to start lifting again in October
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice chalk
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product twice and received a different product the second time. It works just fine, just didn't get the product pictured the second time.
customer_reviews.author: mbmrml

customer_reviews.title: Chalk is fine, shoddy packaging
customer_reviews.text: Came with a hole in the back so a bunch of chalk leaked out and the chalk is damp. Had to air it out for a few days before it was really usable. Chalk seems fine, but seems like there were some package issues.
customer_reviews.author: Derek!

customer_reviews.title: Chalk for a climber on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty good cheap chalk for climbing. If you sweat a lot it may not be the perfect chalk for you but it will get you by.
customer_reviews.author: CaptionDozla

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down my favorite chalk, always my go to option if its available. My hands sweat all day long so come climbing time I really rely on my chalk. BD white gold really performs, unlike Metolius super chalk I've found. Great for refilling chalk balls or using as loose chalk in your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B.

customer_reviews.title: NOT LOOSE CHALK
customer_reviews.text: This is not loose chalk. It comes in a very small 56g block.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good climbing chalk. does its job as intended.
customer_reviews.text: climb better instantly, wont improve your levels magically will definitely give you more grip on slopers and pinches
customer_reviews.author: Flynngore

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk overall
customer_reviews.text: Good chalk for a good price. Only thing I didn't like was that the bag does not look as full as in the images. It looks about half full and feels a little deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Andy & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wanted chalk, got chalk.
customer_reviews.text: Needed pure chalk, got pure chalk. Bout all I need to say. Comes with half clumps half pure grains. I was able to crumble the clumps easily. Dries hands and holds like a charm. I guess that's just Black Diamond quality! Also, great deal to just jump up to the 300g. Don't settle for less!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Different package - same contents
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived in a silver package but the contents was all the same. Great climbing chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get a stain out of my granite. Made a paste of this and hydrogen peroxide and covered the completely dried, sunk in strawberry juice stain, then covered the paste with plastic wrap. 2 hours later I checked and stain was gone, mixture wiped right off. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: My go to chalk purchase for climbing
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite chalk, especially for the price to quality ration. The chalk is smooth, but not the smoothest chalk I've used (for me that is a plus). It has a few larger clumps that can be easily broken up.
customer_reviews.author: Vehshya

customer_reviews.title: Can't find better product than this one!
customer_reviews.text: As of today, this is my second time purchased! I really don't have to describe myself why I bought this product for the second time. The reason is simple because I like it! Will buy it again until I stop climbing (I don't think I will...lol)
customer_reviews.author: Chun

customer_reviews.title: Good and sticky!
customer_reviews.text: Good and sticky! I feel like Alex and Tim are guiding my hands to victory
customer_reviews.author: FelineLuvr

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk
customer_reviews.text: Great chalk, came in powered form not in a block like some reviews have written. Keeps my hands dry and ready to climb hard.
customer_reviews.author: Navid Singhrao

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk-- there were few chunks in it but that's ...
customer_reviews.text: Great chalk-- there were few chunks in it but that's to be expected. I'd recommend it for climbing for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jake and Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great starter chalk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for cheap chalk to get started. It took a few days to figure out exactly how much chalk I liked to use, but once that was settled I was very happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Nk343

customer_reviews.title: Rougher chalk
customer_reviews.text: This is a rougher chalk and comes with large chunks that are easy to break up with fingers. Works well for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but just not up to par.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product twice, at first it was great! When I bought a second bag the chunks of chalk seemed to be harder and the chalk didn't help my sweaty hands as much as I wanted. Although, it's the climber that makes the climbs, and seeming how vigorously I've climbed, 300G didn't last me too long.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: Best value chalk
customer_reviews.text: I have sweaty hands and this chalk works the best for me
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic chalk for the price. Was my first chalk purchase and I’m incredibly happy. Breaks up nicely. Holds well. I use it for mostly indoor lead and top roping. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use this chalk when rock climbing but put it into our Popculta Refillable Chalk Balls (also from Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this product. I use this chalk for climbing and I had to stop climbing to put more and more chalk on my hands since it just did not last very long. I used a different brand of chalk before and I never had any issues until now.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: it will last you forever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag when I was climbing 4+ days/week and I still have lots of chalk left. It really does last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Alcalde

customer_reviews.title: Great Chalk
customer_reviews.text: We recently got a new climbing gym at my university and this chalk has been great. It helps me keep my grip even when my hands are sweaty. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Dorroh

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for rock climbing and doing heavy lifts
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for rock climbing and doing heavy lifts. You can always pay more but to be honest you won't be getting anything extra or special beside a shiny fancy packaging, stick to this!
customer_reviews.author: YGomez

customer_reviews.title: It's chalk
customer_reviews.text: It is chalk, workss exactly the way it should and as all chalk does. I know this probably won't persuade anyone one way or the other, but chalk is chalk. I will say the shipping was very quick Nd the product performs exactly the way it should. I use it primarily for weight lifting and a little goes a long way. I have yet to climb and use it, but I suspect it will perform perfectly there too.
customer_reviews.author: mark reed

customer_reviews.title: Fine chalk
customer_reviews.text: I use this to refill my little chalk bag and it works pretty well. Sometimes it’s hard to get it on my hands but I think that’s due to the chalk bag and not necessarily the chalk inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Momma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used in the gym for deadlifts and other pulling exercises. Don't need a lot and gives you an insane grip to the point the skin on your hands start to rip and hurt because of the bars. Definitely does it's job for gripping things.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this for rock climbing/bouldering and it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: MichelleB

customer_reviews.title: There are cheaper options.
customer_reviews.text: Great chalk, but don't worry too much about buying these major brand names. This is magnesium carbonate chalk, just like most of the others used for grip. Magnesium carbonate is magnesium carbonate, there is no fancy special ingredient added to make one bag or block work better than the others. The chalk came loose but very lumpy and served its purpose well. The bag it comes in isn't too great and ripped under the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Seantrepeneur

customer_reviews.title: Feels slippery when bouldering/rock climbing
customer_reviews.text: The chalk is too smooth and makes the holds feel slippery when rock climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, and I prefer to use this over the sock bag made for chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Its like cheating
customer_reviews.text: After putting this on my hands I can climb walls like spiderman and literally hold onto anything.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Good chalk
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how light chalk was; this helps my grip but the block was so large and light it was surprising
customer_reviews.author: Ty L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Great
customer_reviews.text: I mean it's chalk...it does what chalk does. I use it for climbing and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Conroy Baltzell

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of chalk for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great amount of chalk for a great price. The bag is super durable too so I can throw it around in my trunk whenever I need to refill (which isn't often as it is).
customer_reviews.author: Matt Perrone

customer_reviews.title: Chalk
customer_reviews.text: The chalk looks great. Can’t wait to start using it
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product as expected. Fine chalk with couple of bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Aro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the price and quality together. On my 4th bag already.
customer_reviews.author: soccerman19

customer_reviews.title: This was great, and it will last me a long while
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is a lot of chalk. This was great, and it will last me a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Grande

customer_reviews.title: Good and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I really don't think I should spend more than $5 for a lb of chalk. If the manufacturer kept the chalk dry and clean. It should serve its purpose and this one serves its purpose and also dirt cheap:)
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Yang

customer_reviews.title: For the quality and quantity I was very satisfied. Good mix of chunks and fine chalk so ...
customer_reviews.text: For the quality and quantity I was very satisfied. Good mix of chunks and fine chalk so perfect for all types of uses.
customer_reviews.author: stine88

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Came as a block, fits perfectly in my standard size climbing bag, and it is chalk. Not a whole lot to say. A good price and a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Miles

customer_reviews.title: only the best for my family!
customer_reviews.text: Best out there. Only thing my kids n their cousin want.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Loring & Christy Johns

customer_reviews.title: More chalk than you'll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: It's been approximately 2 months since buying the 300g, and I've barely made a dent even though I climb 3 times a week! And I'm one of those people with really sweaty hands. The only annoying bit is that it comes in chunks that you have to break apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does what chalk is supposed to do. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It does what chalk is supposed to do. I have a re-fillable chalk ball so I opened that up, filled it, and closed off the bag to save for the next fill-up. Not much else to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Love this chalk
customer_reviews.text: Switched from Metrolius chalk to this because it's raw and doesn't dry out my hands. Great friction and uptime. I definitely recommend giving it a shot if you don't mind the slightly higher cost. Also does very well in refillable chalk balls.
customer_reviews.author: Casby

customer_reviews.title: it has a sort of filmy texture that I don't love.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is OK... it has a sort of filmy texture that I don't love.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lumberton

customer_reviews.title: Still okay
customer_reviews.text: My product was opened when it arrived with chalk spilled inside the amazon envelope. Initial presentation is poor, but I can still use it for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s chalk
customer_reviews.text: The chalk is very clumpy in the bag. But it’s chalk, it sticks to my hands and is at a great price. I’d buy it again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: WUbulldog

customer_reviews.title: good grip for heavy wieghts see video
customer_reviews.text: you want grip buy this it works great. when your hands get wet and sweaty this gets your hands dry and grippy instead of getting gummy and gooey. see video
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Huey

customer_reviews.title: many uses
customer_reviews.text: I carry this in my golf bag and stick my hand into it or to get just a little on my fingers to help with gripping my clubs better. I use this instead of a gold glove. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: College Football Fan

customer_reviews.title: Not too fine, not too chunky
customer_reviews.text: Not too fine, not too chunky. Just right. I purchased the 100g variation and it came in the package pictured. Will buy again when it's time for more!
customer_reviews.author: Matt N

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh, not so good
customer_reviews.text: It's chalk....Not very good chalk, it has a tendency to slide off very easily, I am a rock climber and I have to use about 3 or 4 times as much of this than I did my last chalk, it also gets filmy and doesn't like to dry up or improve your sweaty grip very much.
customer_reviews.author: T mor

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and It Works
customer_reviews.text: After searching for chalk for my brother's Christmas present, I finally came to this one that fit my budget perfectly. Though it was inexpensive, he told me he loves it and uses it frequently for rock climbing.
customer_reviews.author: SillyMRS

customer_reviews.title: Best chalk out there
customer_reviews.text: We own a CrossFit gym and we use a lot of chalk. This was all the members favorite, great quality and definitely stay on your hands longer then those other chalks.
customer_reviews.author: Ven phu

customer_reviews.title: These are for my daughter and son in law for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are for my daughter and son in law for Christmas. My 5 star review is based solely on the fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: I need some more.
customer_reviews.text: The best chalk you could buy out there, plenty chunks to play around with but also a lot of crushed chalk to put in my chalk ball! I need some more soon so I will be purchasing this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a big fan of the clumpy style chalk but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Best chalk in the gym
customer_reviews.text: Best chalk in the gym. 5%er in the gym and meet and talk with a lot of people who use chalk. this is the best. its crunchy or gravely which is nice and fills in al the cracks on your hands. other chalk is like fairy dust and too thin. this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Justin J. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Finally a use for my rolling pin!
customer_reviews.text: This bag of chalk came in mostly hard chuncks that needed to be broken up, so finally a use for my rolling pin! But this is very good climbing chalk - the highest rated by OutdoorGearLab, and I agree.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Chalk bag had a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: The chalk works great. I've used this product before. Unfortunately, this time the chalk bag had a hold in it and chalk was all over the inside of the shipping box including the other two items that were included in the box/shipment. The total amount of chalk lost was minor and I was able to put tape over the hole to prevent further leaks but the chalk made a mess of my other two items. Use caution when merging this product with other items in the same order..
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting powdered chalk, not big chunks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It's chalk!
customer_reviews.text: It's chalk, but what is chalk really? Chalk is potential. Chalk is that extra edge. Chalk is greater grip slip resistance. Chalk is success itself. Chalk is...White Gold.
customer_reviews.author: N. Daly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like this chalk for the gym! Bought a second bag now, still the same great stuff. If you're looking for gym chalk that is in a powder form this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W

product_meta.title: Black Diamond Pure Loose Chalk, 200G
product_meta.description: Black Diamond White Chalk is specifically blended for climbing to keep sweat at bay, ensuring maximum grip no matter how hot or humid it gets.
feature_bullets: Improves grip for better climbing performance
